description:
Just see the screenshots, images speak louder than words.

Main Features:

✓ Bulb (w/ Multicolor picker)
✓ Candle (animated!)
✓ Light! (w/ Multicolor picker)
✓ Psychodelic
✓ Neon
✓ Energy Saving
✓ Glowing Sticks (w/ Multicolor picker)
✓ Spiral (2 different spirals)
✓ Lighter (Animated!)
✓ Call for HELP! (fast flashing effect)
✓ Siren (w/ Siren color adjuster)

And finally a settings menu to adjust sounds effects and shaking gesture action.



Finally, a flashlight that looks and works like a real flashlight. Switch it ON and you will see an amazing effect that will light up any room! This app is perfect when you find yourself in the dark or in a concert. Perfect for: - Unlocking doors in the dark - Find your way in a dark room - Take pills in the middle of the night without disturbing anyone. - Read a map and much more P.S. Dont forget to see the image previews. Thank you.



★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★
If you need assistance please contact us info@gp-imports.com
★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★
We will be adding additional apps soon!
★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★
Enjoy!
